argument.name: freeze_screen
argument.description:
.T. = Prevent the screen from updating while a script is running.
.F. = Allow the screen to update while a script is running.

page.discussion: UI_FREEZE() freezes (i.e., prevents the screen from updating) the screen if Flag is .T. while a script is running. If Flag is .F., allows the screen to be updated. Use this command to prevent unnecessary redraws of the screen, or screen flashing, while a script is running.
